title: Gases at 2.00 atm - explain lower pressure for SO2

content.prompt: The best explanation for the lower pressure in container 4 is that SO2 molecules

choices.label: have a larger average speed than the other three gases
occupy a larger portion of the container volume than the other three gases
have stronger intermolecular attractions than the other three gases
